description.value:
This rune utilizes magical principles used in an @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Immovable Rod]{Immovable Rod}.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Your armor anchors you in place, even defying gravity, rendering you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} until you Dismiss the Activation. While you're immobilized in this way, you can be moved only if a creature succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|traits:action:force-open] check to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Force Open]{Force Open} your armor. You can also be moved if 8,000 pounds of pressure are placed upon you, though this is likely fatal.
